section.heading: Compliance with federal and District law.

para.text: Parties to a public-private partnership agreement shall be exempt from Chapter 3A of this title [§ 2-351.01 et seq.], provided that §§ 2-352.02 and 2-354.15 and subchapters VII and X of Chapter 3A of this title shall apply.
Private entities shall comply, to the extent applicable, with:
Subchapter X of Chapter 2 of this title [§ 2-219.01 et seq.];

Subchapter X-A of Chapter 2 of this title [§ 2-220.01 et seq.], or the rate established by the use of a project labor agreement, notice of which must be provided by the Office before soliciting bids or proposals for a public-private partnership;
Subchapter IX-A of Chapter 2 of this title [§ 2-218.01 et seq.];
Subchapter II of Chapter 28 of Title 47 [§ 47-2861 et seq.];
Subchapter XII of Chapter 2 of this title [§ 2-1226.31 et seq.];
The Davis-Bacon Act of 1931, approved March 3, 1931 (46 Stat. 1494; 40 U.S.C. § 3141 et seq.); and

Unless otherwise provided by law, nothing in this chapter shall exempt public-private partnership projects and participating public and private entities from complying with all applicable District laws and regulations.
